name: DUCK, DEATH, AND DESTRUCTION
description:
Death and Destruction from a Duck!
Click the weak points of the building at the right time (green) for more points!

This game was made by a team of students from iAcademy

  • Lead Designer/Programmer  - Xvyce
  • Lead Programmer - bulletproofpancake
  • Lead Artist/Programmer - Grios
  • Artist - Maejima
